name: cs-ast-extester
description: Sample eXTester project for VS Code extension testing

scripts.test: npm run prepare:vscode && npm run build && node ./scripts/install-codescene-extension.js && node ./scripts/prepare-settings-with-token.js && extest run-tests "./out/tests/**/*.test.js" --storage .vscode-test --extensions_dir .vscode-test/extensions --code_settings ./.vscode-test/settings.with-token.json --mocha_config ./mocharc.json
scripts.test:insiders: npm run prepare:vscode && npm run build && node ./scripts/install-codescene-extension.js && node ./scripts/prepare-settings-with-token.js && extest run-tests "./out/tests/**/*.test.js" --type insider --code_version max --storage .vscode-test --extensions_dir .vscode-test/extensions --code_settings ./.vscode-test/settings.with-token.json --mocha_config ./mocharc.json
